question: Which of following political parties forms the government after election?
option1: The political party which secures majority seats in the Lok Sabha
option2: The political party which secures majority seats in the Rajya Sabha
option3: The political party which secures majority seats in both Lok Sabha & Rajya Sabha
answer: The political party which secures majority seats in the Lok Sabha
explanation: The political party which manages to secure majority seats in the Lok Sabha forms the government. The leader of that same party is appointed as the Prime Minister by the President of India. Other ministers are also appointed by the President on the advice of the Prime Minister.
